hotel.name: The Cabins at Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort

content.name: The Cabins at Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort
content.virginView: At Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort, it's time for the outdoor life, Disney style! Both parents and children alike will love staying in the very comfortable rustic-style cabins, surrounded by serene forest. Reminiscent of log dwellings from the pioneer days, special touches include vaulted ceilings, exposed beams and a private deck. Fishing, swimming, horseback riding, wagon rides, boating and cycling are just some of the exciting activities on offer. At night, gather round the campfire for a rousing sing-along, followed by a classic Disney film under the stars.
content.hotelDescription: At Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort, it's time for the outdoor life, Disney style! Both parents and children alike will love staying in very comfortable rustic-style cabins, surrounded by serene forest. Reminiscent of log homes from the pioneer days, special touches include vaulted ceilings, exposed beams and a private deck. Fishing, swimming, horseback riding, wagon rides, boating and cycling are just some of the exciting activities on offer. At night, gather round the campfire for a rousing sing-along, followed by a classic Disney film under the stars.
atAGlance: Extra time in the parks with Early Park Entry (coming soon)
Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system
Cabins perfect for groups or families
Fishing boat hire on the lake

hotel.name: Lake Buena Vista Village Resort & Spa

content.name: Lake Buena Vista Village Resort & Spa
content.virginView: The Lake Buena Vista Resort Village & Spa has fast become a firm favourite with guests, thanks to its supreme location and first-class amenities. Guests can enjoy condominium-style accommodation with all the comforts and conveniences of home. Your private patio or balcony is the perfect place to unwind with a pre-dinner drink, admiring the beautiful sunset in the distance. You are only minutes from the theme parks with Walt Disney World Resort in one direction and Universal Orlando Resort™ in the other — a convenient area to be when staying in the famous fun-filled destination of Orlando, Florida!
content.hotelDescription: This resort has fast become a firm favourite with guests, thanks to its supreme location and first-class amenities. Guests can enjoy apartment-style accommodation with all the comforts and conveniences of home. Your private patio or balcony is the perfect place to unwind with a pre-dinner drink, admiring the beautiful sunset in the distance.
atAGlance: 5-minute drive to Walt Disney World Resort
Club Room upgrades available offering extra benefits

content.name: Solterra
content.virginView: A private community in a peaceful spot, Solterra villas are a great home-from-home. With fun for all ages, from kids to big kids alike, there’s a resort-style pool, fitness centre, tennis courts, and a kids’ playground. And that’s all before you head into your villa. With a private pool, a full kitchen and a dining area, there’s enough here that you don’t have to leave. But if you do, you’re within 12 miles of the theme parks, meaning it’s just minutes to the adrenaline-fueled fun.
content.hotelDescription: A private community in a peaceful spot, Solterra villas are a great home-from-home.
atAGlance: Resort-style swimming pool, spa and fitness centre

content.name: Universal's Aventura Hotel
content.virginView: You'll be warmly welcomed the moment you walk through the front doors of Universal's Aventura Hotel. With a modern environment, open air spaces and sleek lines, the innovative architecture makes this hotel unlike any other. Kids will love the pool area, and there's even a virtual reality games room* they can enjoy. You'll enjoy exclusive benefits at Universal Orlando Resort including Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay, and complimentary transport to all three theme parks and Universal CityWalk.
content.hotelDescription: You'll be warmly welcomed the moment you walk through the front doors of Universal's Aventura Hotel. With a modern environment, open air spaces and sleek lines, the innovative architecture makes this hotel unlike any other. Kids will love the pool area, and there's even a virtual reality games room* they can enjoy. You'll enjoy exclusive benefits at Universal Orlando Resort including Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay, and complimentary transport to all three theme parks and Universal CityWalk. You're also just a short walk from Universal's Volcano Bay.
atAGlance: Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Club Vacations at Orange Lake Resort

content.name: Holiday Inn Club Vacations at Orange Lake Resort
content.virginView: This sprawling resort, bordering Animal Kingdom and the Animal Kingdom Lodge in Walt Disney World Resort, offers so many amenities and activities you never actually have to set foot off the resort! Enjoy 54 holes of challenging golf, 3 video game arcades, a family-fun centre and 3 fitness centres. There is also a 12-acre waterpark with unique water features, water slide, swimming pools and a 1,200ft lazy river-style pool, plus spa tubs. Although each apartment features a fully-equipped kitchen, there's absolutely no need to cook if you don't want to with a choice of 8 restaurants quite literally on your doorstep! For delicious fare from Key West, head to Breezes in the West Village. There's also grilled specialties at River Island Grilling Company and casual fare at the Anchors. 2-Bedroom Apartments cater comfortably for up to 8 and 3-Bedroom Apartments can accommodate 12. You'll feel so at home, you may never want to leave.
content.hotelDescription: This sprawling resort, bordering Animal Kingdom and the Animal Kingdom Lodge in Walt Disney World Resort, offers so many amenities and activities you never actually have to set foot off the resort! Enjoy 54 holes of challenging golf, 3 video game arcades, a family-fun centre and 3 fitness centres. There is also a 12-acre waterpark with unique water features, water slide, swimming pools and a 1,200ft lazy river-style pool, plus spa tubs. Although each apartment features a fully-equipped kitchen, there's absolutely no need to cook if you don't want to with a choice of 8 restaurants quite literally on your doorstep! For delicious fare from Key West, head to Breezes in the West Village. There's also grilled specialties at River Island Grilling Company and casual fare at the Anchors. 2-Bedroom Apartments cater comfortably for up to 8 and 3-Bedroom Apartments can accommodate 12. You'll feel so at home, you may never want to leave.
atAGlance: Huge array of activities for the whole family to enjoy
2- and 3-Bedroom Apartments sleeping up to 12 people
Close to the 4 main theme parks

content.name: Rosen Shingle Creek
content.virginView: This isn’t just a holiday resort, it’s a world in itself. For starters, there’s the 18-hole golf course and 4 heated outdoor pools. The Spa at Shingle Creek is perfect for a pamper, and there's fun for all the family with tennis, basketball and sand volleyball games galore. When hunger calls, head to one of the many restaurants and choose from a range of cuisines, or head out onto I-Drive for some classic American diners. Just a short drive from Orlando's best theme parks, you're never far from the fun. And once the day is done, head to your relaxing room for some down time before another day of adventure ahead.
content.hotelDescription: This isn’t just a holiday resort, it’s a world in itself. For starters, there’s the 18-hole golf course and 4 heated outdoor pools. The Spa at Shingle Creek is perfect for a pamper, and there's fun for all the family with tennis, basketball and sand volleyball games galore. When hunger calls, head to one of the many restaurants and choose from a range of cuisines, or head out onto I-Drive for some classic American diners. Just a short drive from Orlando's best theme parks, you're never far from the fun. And once the day is done, head to your relaxing room for some down time before another day of adventure ahead.
atAGlance: A short drive from Universal Orlando Resort
Minutes from the International Drive Entertainment Corridor

content.name: Four Seasons Resort Orlando
content.virginView: Located inside the gates of Orlando’s Walt Disney World® Resort, Four Seasons Resort Orlando at Walt Disney World® Resort combines legendary Four Seasons hospitality with an unforgettable Walt Disney World® experience. Discover a world of fun and adventure at the 5-acre Explorer Island water park, spend an afternoon drifting along the lazy river, or enjoy some quality time together in the family pool. With 30ft water blasts, fog nozzles and jet sprays, the interactive Splash Zone is the perfect way for little ones to cool off from the hot Florida sunshine. If you’ve worked up an appetite after all that outdoor fun, Four Seasons Resort Orlando has the perfect selection of restaurants to help keep the hunger at bay! Enjoy the rooftop Spanish steakhouse, Capa, or Southern inspired PB&G, to satisfy cravings. At Ravello, you'll find fresh tasty dishes cooked the authentic Italian way. For light bites and refreshments, café Lickety Split is one of several delicious possibilities! To relax, mums and dads can take a dip in the adults-only pool or pay a visit to the luxurious on-site spa. With no less than 18 treatment rooms, 6 couples rooms, and a separate beauty salon, you’ll never be short of ways to indulge!
content.hotelDescription: Located inside the gates of Orlando’s Walt Disney World® Resort, Four Seasons Resort Orlando at Walt Disney World® Resort combines legendary Four Seasons hospitality with an unforgettable Disney experience.
atAGlance: Central Florida's only AAA Five Diamond Award property
5-acre Explorer Island with pools, splash pad and lazy river
Six vibrant restaurants including Rooftop steakhouse offering spectacular views of the nightly fireworks
13,000 square foot spa offering an oasis of serenity

content.name: Rosemont Woods or Crofton Springs
content.virginView: The homes at Rosemont Woods or Crofton Springs are luxury villas with three, four and five bedroom homes in a private community, with a peaceful and tranquil surrounding. Set in spacious grounds, this golf community offers a home-from-home experience with fully furnished houses and fun for the little ones with a children’s playground and swimming pool. Big kids' are kept entertained too at the 18-hole, Par 72 Championship Golf Course designed by Michael Dasher.
content.hotelDescription: The homes at Rosemont Woods or Crofton Springs are luxury villas with three, four and five bedroom homes in a private community, with a peaceful and tranquil surrounding. Set in spacious grounds, this golf community offers a home-from-home experience with fully furnished houses and fun for the little ones with a children’s playground and swimming pool. Big kids' are kept entertained too at the 18-hole, Par 72 Championship Golf Course designed by Michael Dasher.
atAGlance: Within 13 miles drive of Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Omni Orlando Resort at Championsgate
content.virginView: An epic resort, the Omni Orlando at ChampionsGate is fun-for-all personified. Wake up, and each day know you’ve got the chance to take on a new adventure. Whether it be making your way round the 36-holes of golf, whizzing down waterslides and jumping into the pools, or relaxing in the spa while little ones enjoy the kids’ camp. When you’re ready to hit those adrenaline-filled parks, you’re just a short journey away, and you can even hop on the free shuttle to Walt Disney World Resort. And when you’re ready to retreat after a busy day, your room, suite or apartment is a welcome home-from-home for some well-deserved R&R.
content.hotelDescription: An epic resort, the Omni Orlando at ChampionsGate is fun-for-all personified. Wake up, and each day know you’ve got the chance to take on a new adventure. Whether it be making your way round the 36-holes of golf, whizzing down waterslides and jumping into the pools, or relaxing in the spa while little ones enjoy the kids’ camp.
atAGlance: 10-minute drive to Walt Disney World® Resort theme parks, with free shuttle service
Swimming pools galore with waterslides, a wave pool, and a lazy river

content.name: Balmoral Resort
content.virginView: Balmoral at Waters Edge – regal by name, regal by nature. A private resort, exclusive to Virgin Holidays guests in the UK, with high-end homes with everything you might possibly need from a home-away-from-home. There’s the clubhouse, home to a restaurant, bar, and entertainment, leading out to a zero-entry pool, hot tub, and splash area with water cannons and slides. Back in your villa, there’s a full kitchen and your own private pool, so you really don’t have to head out if you can’t pull yourself away. And when it comes to heading out to Orlando, you’re within 22 miles of the theme parks. You’ll be on those loop-the-loops in no time.
content.hotelDescription: Balmoral at Waters Edge – regal by name, regal by nature. A private resort, exclusive to Virgin Holidays guests in the UK, with high-end homes with everything you might possibly need from a home-away-from-home.
atAGlance: Luxury-style 3-, 5- and 6-bedroom villas exclusive to Virgin Holidays in the UK
Pool zone with a zero-entry pool, water park and splash playground
Every villa has a private swimming pool and covered lanai

content.name: Rosen Inn at Pointe Orlando
content.virginView: This hotel really goes out of its way to keep you and the kids amused with lively karaoke nights in the Zebras Sports Bar and Grille. It also serves food until midnight, plus there is a late-night deli, which is handy for night owls. This is a big hotel with 3 swimming pools and a family restaurant with an excellent kids eat free programme, guaranteed to help your budget no end. Opposite is the Pointe Orlando shopping area with some cool clothes shops and 21 cinema screens. The I-RIDE trolley is a convenient way to see International Drive's attractions — even better, there is a trolley stop right outside the hotel.
content.hotelDescription: A big, friendly hotel with three pools and lively karaoke nights in the Zebras Sports Bar and Grille. Opposite is the Pointe Orlando shopping and cinema complex.
atAGlance: A 10-minute drive to Universal Orlando Resort™
Complimentary scheduled transport to selected theme parks

content.name: Sonesta ES Suites
content.virginView: Sonesta ES Suites Orlando offers a convenient International Drive location, close to all of Orlando's attractions. Appealingly fresh and modern, all guest suites, public spaces, and dining options have been completely re-imagined. On offer are 1- and 2-bedroom suites, complimentary WiFi, an on-site Shoppe convenience store, and a lobby lounge with daily happy hour specials. Additional facilities include a fitness centre, heated swimming pool and jacuzzi. The cherry on top? There's also a complimentary shuttle to Disney World and Universal!
content.hotelDescription: Completely reimagined, Sonesta ES Suites Orlando offers a fresh modern look throughout the recently renovated hotel. This all-suite, courtyard-style hotel is perfect for families — with rooms that easily accommodate 6-8 people.
atAGlance: Lobby lounge with daily happy hour

salesMessages.name: FL 2021 Sonesta ES Suites SM2

content.name: Legacy Park
content.virginView: One of the more popular Davenport villa communities, Legacy Park is divided into four villages. All villas come complete with screened-in porch and swimming pool - great for cooling off in after soaking up the Floridian sun. Fully air-conditioned, choose between 3-, 4- or 5-Bedroom Villas, each with a full American-sized kitchen, at least one separate living area. On US 27, close to the I-4, you are minutes from all attractions, including the Disney theme parks and popular Champions Gate Golf Complex. There are also several supermarkets close by, handy for keeping your cupboards stocked. A great choice for a family or groups of friends, you’ll enjoy returning home to Legacy Park at the end of each day.
content.hotelDescription: One of the more popular Davenport villa communities, Legacy Park is divided into four villages. All villas come complete with screened-in porch and swimming pool - great for cooling off in after soaking up the Floridian sun.
atAGlance: Minutes away from major theme parks

hotel.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Dockside Inn and Suites

content.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Dockside Inn and Suites
content.virginView: A sister hotel to Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Surfside Inn and Suites, this hotel is a perfect blend of coastal retreat vibe with the fun and adrenaline fueled theme parks conveniently close by. Of course there are the exclusive added benefits of staying at a Universal hotel, including Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay one hour before the theme parks open (select attractions, valid theme park admission required), plus complimentary transport to and from the parks. 2-bedroom suites sleep six, and are a great base for larger families to unwind after all the thrills of the day.
content.hotelDescription: A sister hotel to Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Surfside Inn and Suites, this hotel is a perfect blend of coastal retreat vibe with the fun and adrenaline fueled Universal Studios conveniently close by.
atAGlance: Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks

content.name: Bahama Bay Resort
content.virginView: This Caribbean-style resort is right on the banks of the picturesque Lake Davenport and it's laid out over 70 acres of landscaped gardens, making it a truly beautiful place to stay. It even has its own beach on the banks of the lake! The apartment-style condos are exceptionally well equipped and you'll really have no need to eat out, but if you don't want to cook there's a great restaurant on site. This resort is a fantastic place to be if you're the sporty type, with volleyball, basketball, tennis to contend with. Kids will love the playroom and games arcade, while adults can relax and listen to soft Caribbean music by the pool, or take advantage of the fabulous new spa, offering a myriad of treatments and a fitness centre to boot. At the end of the day, the clubhouse balcony is an ideal spot to watch the Disney fireworks light up the sky.
content.hotelDescription: This picturesque Caribbean-style resort sits right on the banks of Lake Davenport in 70 acres of landscaped gardens.
atAGlance: 15-min Drive to Walt Disney World Resort
Great sports facilities and activities for all the family

content.name: Rosen Inn International
content.virginView: The Rosen Inn International is situated in the heart of International Drive, the main entertainment centre in Orlando, so it's in a great location to explore the shops, bars and restaurants that line this popular road. It's also ridiculously easy to find, as it's next to the world's largest McDonalds! On top of that, it is just a 5 minute drive to Universal Orlando Resort™ with all those fantastic roller coasters, special effects and 3D rides. Full-on buffet breakfasts and dinners are served in the hotel's Fountain View Restaurant, and they have some very special discounts, exclusively for you. There's also a Lite Bite Deli for a snack on the run. The rooms have a modern and fresh new look whilst keeping that much needed comfort at the end of the day. Including a fridge, microwave and coffee maker, you can store your own refreshing cold drinks and make snacks for hungry kids! There are two swimming pools just waiting for you to leap into after a hard day exploring the theme parks. What's more, all public areas have been completely renovated.
content.hotelDescription: The Rosen Inn International is situated in the heart of International Drive, the main entertainment centre in Orlando, so it's in a great location to explore the shops, bars and restaurants that line this popular road. Full-on buffet breakfasts and dinners are served in the hotel's Fountain View Restaurant, and they have some very special discounts, exclusively for you. There's also a Lite Bite Deli for a snack on the run.
atAGlance: A 5-minute drive to Universal Orlando Resort™
Complimentary scheduled transportation to selected theme parks
Complimentary WiFi in rooms and public areas

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Resort Lake Buena Vista

content.name: Holiday Inn Resort Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: This hotel is within a mile of the Walt Disney World Resort and offers a wide range of facilities and seasonal entertainment. Enjoy spacious Standard Rooms or Kid Suites that sleep up to 4 children featuring bunk beds with twin-size mattresses. There are even seasonal poolside activities to enjoy outside of theme park time, including dive-in movies and a Cyber Arcade. You're never too far from local attractions with our convenient scheduled shuttles making this hotel very accessible for non-drivers.
content.hotelDescription: This hotel is within a mile of the Walt Disney World Resort and offers a wide range of facilities and seasonal entertainment. Enjoy spacious Standard Rooms or Kid Suites that sleep up to 4 children featuring bunk beds with twin-size mattresses. There are even seasonal poolside activities to enjoy outside of theme park time, including dive-in movies and a Cyber Arcade. You're never too far from local attractions with our convenient scheduled shuttles making this hotel very accessible for non-drivers.

content.name: Disney's Animal Kingdom Lodge
content.virginView: The adventure of a jungle safari comes alive right before your eyes at Disney's Animal Kingdom Lodge. With lush surroundings and beautiful savannahs, you'll be transported to another world when you step through the front doors. From restaurants, viewing platforms, and possibly even your room, you can watch zebra, giraffes and gazelles roam free and graze in their natural environments. Little ones can learn more about the fascinating animals, and even be a junior researcher for a day. And when you're not watching the animals in awe, you can take a dip in one of the pools, feast on some good food, or hit the parks in a matter of minutes! The adventure never ends here.
content.hotelDescription: The adventure of a jungle safari comes alive right before your eyes at Disney's Animal Kingdom Lodge. With lush surroundings and beautiful savannahs, you'll be transported to another world when you step through the front doors. From restaurants, viewing platforms, and possibly even your room, you can watch zebra, giraffes and gazelles roam free and graze in their natural environments. Little ones can learn more about the fascinating animals, and even be a junior researcher for a day. And when you're not watching the animals in awe, you can take a dip in one of the pools, feast on some good food, or hit the parks in a matter of minutes! The adventure never ends here.

Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system
Rooms overlooking the savanna with zebras, giraffes and gazelles

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: The Shire at Westhaven
content.virginView: Within a gated community and less than a mile from Championsgate are The Shire at Westhaven Villas. Well-kept lawns, a gym, and tennis and volleyball courts are all within the grounds here, and that’s before you step into your villa. You’ll have a private pool, a games room, and all the things you’d expect to find in the perfect home away from home.
content.hotelDescription: Within a gated community and less than a mile from Championsgate are The Shire at Westhaven Villas.
atAGlance: Within an 11-mile drive to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Disney's Port Orleans Resort
content.virginView: Bringing Southern USA to Florida, Disney's Port Orleans will have every member of constantly entertained. You can enjoy the likes of waterslides, pool parties, evenings campfires, movies under the stars, and that's just the start. You can also enjoy some down time here too, and your room is a cosy retreat. Heading to the parks? Hop on the water taxi and enjoy a leisurely sail before the real adventure begins.
content.hotelDescription: Bringing Southern USA to Florida, Disney's Port Orleans will have every member of constantly entertained. You can enjoy the likes of waterslides, pool parties, evenings campfires, movies under the stars, and that's just the start. You can also enjoy some down time here too, and your room is a cosy retreat. Heading to the parks? Hop on the water taxi and enjoy a leisurely sail before the adventure begins.
atAGlance: Extra time in the parks with Early Park Entry (coming soon)
Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system

content.name: Grand Orlando Resort at Celebration
content.virginView: Fountains and falls, lush gardens, and fun for everyone is what you’ll find at the Grand Orlando Resort at Celebration. Little ones will love the pools, complete with water slide of course! There’s even a playground, a games room, tennis courts, and a daily activity programme to keep busy. And if that’s not enough, you can be at Walt Disney World Resort within 5 minutes, meaning you’ll be zooming around those rides and coasters in no time.
content.hotelDescription: Fountains and falls, lush gardens, and fun for everyone is what you’ll find at the Grand Orlando Resort at Celebration. Little ones will love the pools, complete with water slide of course!
atAGlance: 5-minute drive to Walt Disney World Resort, with complimentary scheduled transport

content.name: Sheraton Vistana Resort
content.virginView: This 135-acre resort has an astonishing array of sporting opportunities including tennis and mini-golf, as well as several swimming pools and whirlpools in which to splash around. There are lots of organised activities, which we reckon doubles your fun and gives you the chance to meet new friends. Whether its the sports or the theme parks that have tired you out, why not treat yourself to a massage - you are on holiday after all! Dining choices include Zimmies, Tacky Tiki Bar and Grill and Castaways. The apartments are attractively furnished, light and spacious, and the 2-Bedroom Apartments sleep up to 8 people.
content.hotelDescription: Welcome to 135 acres of swimming, tennis, mini-golf and more, with an array of organised activities. The apartments are attractively furnished, light and spacious, and there's a selection of eateries.
atAGlance: 5-min drive to Walt Disney World Resort
Numerous sports and activities to choose from

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: The Enclave Suites
content.virginView: Just a 5-minute drive to Universal Orlando Resort™ and within walking distance of the International Drive Live entertainment complex, this is a great hotel with a heated indoor pool and 2 outdoor pools to relax by on days off from the fast pace of the thrilling theme parks! The Studios and 2-Bedroom Suites are comfortable and provide extra space, with a private balcony and fully-equipped kitchen. Exclusive to Virgin Holidays, why not treat yourself and upgrade to a Superior Studio or Superior 2-Bedroom Suite? All have modern furniture and kitchens with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops. If you decide to go out in the evenings, you can either walk or get the I-RIDE Trolley to the local restaurants on this lively strip.
content.hotelDescription: Just a 5-minute drive to Universal Orlando Resort™ and within walking distance of the International Drive Live entertainment complex, this is a great hotel with a heated indoor pool and 2 outdoor pools to relax by on days off from the fast pace of the thrilling theme parks! The Studios and 2-Bedroom Suites are comfortable and provide extra space, with a private balcony and fully-equipped kitchen. Exclusive to Virgin Holidays, why not treat yourself and upgrade to a Superior Studio or Superior 2-Bedroom Suite? All have modern furniture and kitchens with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops. For a little extra pampering you could upgrade further to Club Room Studio or Club Room 2-Bedroom Suite. If you decide to go out in the evenings, you can either walk or get the I-RIDE Trolley to the local restaurants on this lively strip.
atAGlance: A 5-minute drive to Universal Orlando ResortȒ
Children's play area and splash pools

content.name: Disney's Grand Floridian Resort & Spa
content.virginView: Disney's Grand Floridian Resort & Spa is the crème de la crème of the Disney Resort hotels. Here, the entire family can enjoy Disney at its grandest, with lavish, turn-of-the-century décor, spectacular views and impeccable service to pamper your every whim. Make sure the kids take an afternoon siesta as every night the Electrical Water Pageant, a floating, lighted procession of 'sea creatures' takes place on Bay Lake and is an event not to be missed! There is also fine dining to be had in Victoria & Albert's restaurant, complete with your own personal butler service! The world-class spa offers all kinds of divine treatments or head to the lake for a spot of sailing.
content.hotelDescription: Disney's Grand Floridian Resort & Spa is the crème de la crème of the Disney Resort hotels. Here, the entire family can enjoy Disney at its grandest, with lavish, turn-of-the-century décor, spectacular views and impeccable service to pamper your every whim.
atAGlance: Extra time in the parks with Early Park Entry (coming soon)
Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system
Evening light procession on Bay Lake

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Southern Dunes
content.virginView: A classic all-American gated community, the relaxed golf retreat of Southern Dunes features stylish air-conditioned homes, each with free WiFi and its own private pool for those refreshing post-theme park dips. As well as your own pool, you get to enjoy the community’s two pools, and its tennis courts, fitness centre, playground, and golf course and Club House, which comes complete with a restaurant and bar.
content.hotelDescription: A classic all-American gated community, the relaxed golf retreat of Southern Dunes features stylish air-conditioned homes, each with free WiFi and its own private pool for those refreshing post-theme park dips. As well as your own pool, you get to enjoy the community’s two pools, and its tennis courts, fitness centre, playground, and golf course and Club House, which comes complete with a restaurant and bar.
atAGlance: Within a 25 to 30-minute drive of Walt Disney World Resort
18-hole golf course with clubhouse and restaurant

hotel.name: The Grove Resort & Water Park Orlando

content.name: The Grove Resort & Spa
content.virginView: When you think of an Orlando holiday you think of Walt Disney World, Universal Orlando and the many other theme parks, water parks and attractions that there are to visit. However, you’ll be hard pushed to want to leave this hotel with the facilities and activities they have on-site for all the family! A huge resort, with spacious suites that are up to 5 times the size of your average Orlando hotel room, this is perfect for families and groups alike. The suites are complete with kitchen and dining area, for those evenings when you want to chill after a busy day exploring. The Sufari water park is an attraction in it’s own right, complete with water slides, lazy river and a surf simulator. There are other swimming pools if you’re looking for a more chilled vibe, and whatever pool you’re at, you’ll never be far away from a bar for refreshments. The activities aren’t all water based, there’s a huge indoor entertainment centre with arcade games and glow in the dark mini golf, the kids won’t know where to start! The resort feels secluded and self-contained, but you’re just a five minute drive to shops, restaurants and attractions on Highway 192, and only 10 minutes from Walt Disney World, with a complimentary shuttle bus included to take you to the door and back.
atAGlance: Daily Transportation to and from Walt Disney World® and Universal Orlando included
All suite accommodation, perfect for families

content.name: Wyndham Orlando Resort
content.virginView: Welcome to our walkable neighbourhood! Located in the heart of the ICON Park entertainment district, putting guests a few short steps away from exciting attractions and International Drive's outstanding dining and shopping, and just minutes away from Orlando’s world-famous theme parks via complimentary shuttle. The wheel at ICON park is just a stones throw away, and staying at the hotel you get exclusive rates for the East Coast's largest observation wheel, offering breathtaking, 360-degree views of Central Florida. The guest rooms feature upscale touches, such as pillow-top mattresses, massaging showers and 40" flat-screen TVs. This true Florida resort will put guests right at ease, with relaxing lobby and poolside bars, lush gardens, winding lagoons, two pools, a fitness centre, sauna and steam rooms. The family friendly suites feature fun bunk beds in a separate alcove with TV that will be a hit with the little ones.
content.hotelDescription: Stay where you play! In the heart of the ICON Park entertainment district with exciting attractions and minutes from the world-famous theme parks. This true Florida resort features lush gardens, winding lagoons, two pools, fitness centre, sauna, steam room and multiple on-site dining options. Family friendly suites include bunk beds.
atAGlance: A 10-minute drive to Universal Orlando ResortȒ
Complimentary scheduled transport to Universal Orlando ResortȒ
In the heart of the ICON Park entertainment district

salesMessages.name: FL Wyndham Orlando Resort International Drive FNO 2023
salesMessages.description: Free Nights: Stay for 7 nights, pay for 6 (stay for 14, pay for 12) for stays completed between 2 Jan '23–30 Apr '24. Any applicable offers have been calculated into the prices shown. Offers may not be combinable.
salesMessages.salesMessageDescription: Free Nights: Stay for 7 nights, pay for 6 (stay for 14, pay for 12) for stays completed between 2 Jan '23–30 Apr '24. Any applicable offers have been calculated into the prices shown. Offers may not be combinable.

content.name: Disney's Coronado Springs Resort
content.virginView: Sat on the lakeside, Disney's Coronado Springs will treat you to relaxed vibes, as well as fun for all the family. Little ones (and big kids!) will love the huge waterslide, and be sure to catch a movie under the stars when the night rolls in. Head to one of the many restaurants and savour some delicious Spanish and Mexican dishes. You're close to a number of Disney World parks here, so those adrenaline-filled days out are just a short few moments away.
content.hotelDescription: Sat on the lakeside, Disney's Coronado Springs will treat you to relaxed vibes, as well as fun for all the family. Little ones (and big kids!) will love the huge waterslide, and be sure to catch a movie under the stars when the night rolls in. Head to one of the many restaurants and savour some delicious Spanish and Mexican dishes. You're close to a number of Disney World parks here, so those adrenaline-filled days out are just a short few moments away.
atAGlance: Extra time in the parks with Early Park Entry (coming soon)
Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Coco Key Hotel & Water Park
content.virginView: Not only does CoCo Key offer great family rooms with plenty of space in the heart of Orlando, it boasts it's own water park too — one of the best in the area! With 14 slides, three heated pools and a state-of-the-art gaming arcade, kids of all ages can play to their hearts content all day, every day. You're also just a hop and a skip away from a myriad of Orlando attractions (including the theme parks), so there's never a dull moment! And although restaurants abound (you can walk to over 50 restaurants and shops), The Tradewinds Restaurant on-site is a great place to dine, feasting on deep south favourites, followed by amazing dessert selections. A daily entertainment program means the kids will be making friends in no time, including movies screened by the pool and interesting activities that are hosted by the hotel staff. Look for the hotel mascot CoCo in the morning and afternoon for photo opportunities.
content.hotelDescription: Not only does CoCo Key offer great family rooms with plenty of space in the heart of Orlando, it boasts it's own water park too — one of the best in the area! With 14 slides, three heated pools and a state-of-the-art gaming arcade, kids of all ages can play to their hearts content all day, every day. You're also just a hop and a skip away from a myriad of Orlando attractions (including the theme parks), so there's never a dull moment! And although restaurants abound (you can walk to over 50 restaurants and shops), The Tradewinds Restaurant on-site is a great place to dine, feasting on deep south favourites, followed by amazing dessert selections. A daily entertainment program means the kids will be making friends in no time, including movies screened by the pool and interesting activities that are hosted by the hotel staff. Look for the hotel mascot CoCo in the morning and afternoon for photo opportunities.
atAGlance: Complimentary transportation to Universal Orlando ResortȒ
Resort fee waived for Virgin Holidays guests

salesMessages.name: FL 2020 & 2021 Coco Key Hotel (2)

salesMessages.salesMessageDescription: Resort fee waived: For all Virgin Holidays guests, saving $32 per room per day. This includes daily access to the hotel's water park.

content.name: Disney's Wilderness Lodge
content.virginView: The wilderness has never been more wonderful than at Disney's Wilderness Lodge! The majesty and grandeur of the great American Northwest echo throughout this relaxing mountain retreat and will appeal to every member of the family. Bubbling springs, authentic Native American carvings and an inspiring décor take you back in time to the historic national park lodges of yesteryear. Scenic wonders are everywhere, from fantastically themed restaurants to an amazing geyser faithfully shooting water 12-storeys high every hour! The kids will love the totem pole in the lobby, carved with all their favourite Disney characters. In fact, there's endless fun to be had here for everyone, both day and night!
content.hotelDescription: The wilderness has never been more wonderful than at Disney's Wilderness Lodge! The majesty and grandeur of the great American Northwest echo throughout this relaxing mountain retreat and will appeal to every member of the family.
atAGlance: Extra time in the parks with Early Park Entry (coming soon)
Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system
Larger villas for groups and families

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Disney's Caribbean Beach Resort
content.virginView: Bringing the Caribbean to Florida, you can expect endless fun at Disney's Caribbean Beach. Split into 5 islands: Barbados, Jamaica, Martinique, Trinidad and Aruba, you can expect loads of pools to relax in, and so much for little ones to do. Head to one of the lively markets, chill at the beach surrounding the lake, or spend a few hours at the Fuentes del Morro pool, with slides galore, water cannons, and a shipwreck play area. Heading to the parks couldn't be easier - jump aboard the Skyliner gondola and you'll be in Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios in no time!
content.hotelDescription: Bringing the Caribbean to Florida, you can expect endless fun at Disney's Caribbean Beach. Split into 5 islands: Barbados, Jamaica, Martinique, Trinidad and Aruba, you can expect loads of pools to relax in, and so much for little ones to do. Head to one of the lively markets, chill at the beach surrounding the lake, or spend a few hours at the Fuentes del Morro pool, with slides galore, water cannons, and a shipwreck play area. Heading to the parks couldn't be easier - jump aboard the Skyliner gondola and you'll be in Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios in no time!
atAGlance: Extra time in the parks with Early Park Entry (coming soon)
Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system
5 different Caribbean islands in one resort
White sandy beaches and palm trees

hotel.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort-Surfside Inn and Suites

content.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort-Surfside Inn and Suites
content.virginView: With a chilled beach vibe and a lakefront setting, Universal's Surfside Inn and Suites boasts rates for even the most budget-conscious guests. Your room will have a relaxed feel, and there's even larger suites to sleep all the family. You'll enjoy exclusive benefits like Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, valid theme park admission required), and complimentary transportation to and from the parks.
content.hotelDescription: With a chilled beach vibe and a lakefront setting, Universal's Surfside Inn and Suites boasts rates for even the most budget-conscious guests.
atAGlance: Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks
Extra-affordable value hotel, with 2-bedroom suites that sleep up to 6 people

salesMessage.details: Stay Longer: Book by 31 Dec 2023 for travel between 1 Jan '2231 Dec '23 and receive the following discounts on accomodation costs: Stay 7 nights or more and receive up to 30% off. Any applicable offers have been calculated into the prices shown. Offers may not be combinable

content.name: Hyatt Regency Grand Cypress
content.virginView: There are far too many facilities at this marvellous 1,500-acre resort to detail here. The swimming pool is the kind that has kids gasping with wonder-waterfalls, grottos, whirlpools and a 124-ft long water slide tower, new water jet splash zone and rock climbing areas for kids creates an aqueous wonderland; and on the lake, you can practice kayaking, canoeing or just simply pedal away toward the sunset, there is even a white sand beach for those waiting to sit back and relax, and 45 holes of top golf, with a pitch 'n' putt for non-golfers to enjoy. There are some great restaurants and bars. The new pool bar, On the Rock, is located by Lake Windsong, offering views of the lake and the pool, four 60" TVs, full service bar and food service options. Enjoy Key West style seafood and steaks at Hemingways. Be one of the first to enjoy their new recreational features: New Water slide, Water Jet Splash zone, rock climbing for kids and the pool bar!
content.hotelDescription: There are far too many facilities at this marvellous 1,500-acre resort to detail here. The swimming pool is the kind that has kids gasping with wonder waterfalls, grottos, whirlpools and a 124-ft long water slide tower, new water jet splash zone and rock climbing areas for kids creates an aqueous wonderland; and on the lake, you can practice kayaking, canoeing or just simply pedal away toward the sunset, there is even a white sand beach for those waiting to sit back and relax, and 45 holes of top golf, with a pitch 'n' putt for non-golfers to enjoy.
atAGlance: 5-minute drive to Walt Disney World Resort
124-ft long water slide tower and Water jet splash zone

hotel.name: Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village

content.name: Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village
content.virginView: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Courtyard by Marriott offering a high standard of furnishings and comfort. As a Walt Disney World Good Neighbor® Hotel, it couldn’t be easier for you to plan your trip to the parks, with a free shuttle service to selected parks. However, should you choose to stay on-site for the day, there are plentiful dining options and both indoor and outdoor pools to suit any weather.
content.hotelDescription: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value, the Courtyard by Marriott offering a higher standard of furnishings and comfort, while the SpringHill Suites have more of a studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area.
atAGlance: Free shuttle to nearby Walt Disney World Resort

hotel.name: Loews Sapphire Falls Resort at Universal Orlando

content.name: Loews Sapphire Falls Resort at Universal Orlando
content.virginView: Loews Sapphire Falls Universal Orlando will take you to a paradise in the heart of the tropics. Blue waterfalls cascade over lush grounds, and in the distance the calming sounds of steel drums call you to take in the scenic water views. Ease into ‘island time’ and let go. Kids will love the pool, complete with water slide, games, and somewhere to grab some food without stepping too far from the lounger. And when it’s time to go and explore the parks, you’ll enjoy exclusive benefits like early park admission to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay (select attractions, valid theme park admission required), and complimentary transport. It's a great way to experience Universal Orlando Resort.
content.hotelDescription: Loews Sapphire Falls will take you to a paradise in the heart of the tropics. Blue waterfalls cascade over lush grounds, and in the distance the calming sounds of steel drums call you to take in the scenic water views. Ease into ‘island time’ and let go.
atAGlance: Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks
The largest pool of all the Universal Orlando hotels

content.name: Rosen Inn
content.virginView: The Rosen Inn is just a mile from Universal Orlando Resort™, perfectly located for fans of thrill rides like the Incredible Hulk Coaster® and Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey™. If you are a non-driver, the hotel operates an excellent complimentary scheduled shuttle service to select theme parks. The Palms Dining Room provides a great value breakfast buffet for families, Shogun Japanese steakhouse serves delicious cuisine and Sakura Sushi Bar featuring freshly-prepared sushi rolls, nigari and sashimi served in an intimate setting. For an early evening reviver, The International Pub is on hand with a suitably global array of cocktails and American cuisine. Nearby attractions include the I Drive 360, Madame Tussauds wax museum, and Pirates Adventure Dinner Show — an experience well worth checking out.
content.hotelDescription: The Rosen Inn is just a mile from Universal Orlando Resort™, perfectly located for fans of thrill rides like the Incredible Hulk Coaster® and Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey™. There's an excellent complimentary scheduled shuttle service to select local attractions.
atAGlance: Scheduled transportation to selected theme parks

hotel.name: Doubletree by Hilton Orlando at SeaWorld

content.name: Doubletree by Hilton Orlando at SeaWorld
content.virginView: This hotel is conveniently located half way between Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™, it is the perfect contrast of incredibly convenient location and contemporary accommodation. You really are spoilt for choice around the hotel's 28 acres. The kids will love the free mini-golf, two large swimming pools and games room; plenty to keep them happy when they're not at the theme parks. Laguna is the main restaurant, with an atmosphere that is enlivened by regular seasonal entertainment (not to mention their tropical cocktails!).
content.hotelDescription: This hotel is conveniently located half way between Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™, it is the perfect contrast of incredibly convenient location and contemporary accommodation. The kids will love the free mini-golf, two large swimming pools and games room; plenty to keep them happy when you are having a relaxing break from the theme parks.
atAGlance: Complimentary self-parking for Virgin Holidays guests

content.name: Disney's Art of Animation Resort
content.virginView: We all know and love those Disney classics - The Lion King, Finding Nemo, Cars, The Little Mermaid - and Disney's Art of Animation is where you'll find inspiration from each of them. From themed swimming pools to family suites with themed decor, there's something for everyone here. Be sure to check out The Big Blue Pool, complete with water jets and a play area for little ones. And after those busy days in the parks, order a pizza (or two!) to your room.
content.hotelDescription: We all know and love those Disney classics - The Lion King, Finding Nemo, Cars, The Little Mermaid - and Disney's Art of Animation is where you'll find inspiration from each of them. From themed swimming pools to family suites with themed decor, there's something for everyone here. Be sure to check out The Big Blue Pool, complete with water jets and a play area for little ones. And after those busy days in the parks, order a pizza (or two!) to your room.
atAGlance: Extra time in the parks with Early Park Entry (coming soon)
Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system
Underwater speakers in the swimming pool

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Vista Cay Resort by Millenium
content.virginView: Fun for all the family? Check. Apartments and townhouses with heaps of room? Check. Your stay at Vista Cay Resort can be as relaxing or action-packed as you make it. Your apartment or townhouse has a kitchen, balcony, living and dining area, and multiple bedrooms and bathrooms. Head to the pool bar in the warmer months and enjoy a cocktail and a bite to eat, and take the plunge into one of the pools to cool off. There’s even a sports court, games arcade and a kids’ playground, so little ones will be kept busy every minute of the day. And when it comes to heading to the parks, you’re just a 15-minute drive to Walt Disney World Resort and 10 minutes to Universal Studios.
content.hotelDescription: Fun for all the family? Check. Apartments and townhouses with heaps of room? Check. Your stay at Vista Cay Resort can be as relaxing or action-packed as you make it.

salesMessages.name: FL Vista Cay Resort 10 Discount
salesMessages.description: Booking Bonus: Receive up to 10% off the accommodation cost between 1 May–30 Nov '22. Any applicable offers have been calculated into the prices shown. Offers may not be combinable.
salesMessages.salesMessageDescription: Booking Bonus: Receive up to 10% off the accommodation cost between 1 May–30 Nov '22. Any applicable offers have been calculated into the prices shown. Offers may not be combinable.

content.name: staySky Suites I-Drive Orlando
content.virginView: Offering a great location, this hotel is within walking distance of the iDrive 360 complex and is an excellent choice for couples, families or a group of friends. Of course, the legendary theme parks are the number one reason you're likely to visit Orlando, and lucky for you they're only a short drive away. In the evenings, or if you fancy a day off from the parks, there's an outdoor heated swimming pool and hot tub to relax in or, if you still have some energy left, take advantage of the onsite gym to keep in shape. The complimentary Continental breakfast will get you off to a good start so you're ready for your action-packed day of adventure. The Executive Rooms are well-equipped and perfect for couples but if you fancy more space, the 1- or 2-Bedroom Suites offer the convenience of self catering with fully-equipped kitchenettes, dining area and a separate living room with sleeper sofa. Being close to International Drive, you'll find plenty of shopping, entertainment, restaurants and bars within walking distance.
content.hotelDescription: The legendary theme parks are the number one reason you’re likely to visit Orlando and lucky for you, they’re only a short drive away. In the evenings, or if you fancy a day off from the parks, there’s an outdoor heated swimming pool and hot tub to relax in. Being close to International Drive, you’ll find plenty of shopping, entertainment, restaurants and bars within walking distance.
atAGlance: A 5-minute drive to Universal Orlando ResortȒ

hotel.name: Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort Area

content.name: Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Resort
content.virginView: Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort Area is an official Disney World® Hotel so you’ll be right near all the action. Just opposite Disney Springs®, this prime location offers you over 150 shops, restaurants and attractions for you to explore. You’ll also be only a short distance away from the likes of Magic Kingdom and Hollywood Studios so you'll be in the queues for the latest rides in no time. This resort also has its own aquatic area, with two pools, a jacuzzi and water playground for the little ones, or visit the courts and try your hand at basketball or sand volleyball. There’s so much to do, you’ll never be short of fun and excitement.
content.hotelDescription: Located in the Disney Springs™ area, the popular Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Resort offers a wide range of facilities including an aquatic playground and swimming pool with a spacious sundeck area and sporting activities such as tennis and basketball.

content.name: JW Marriott Grande Lakes Orlando
content.virginView: If you are looking for a truly luxurious stay, JW Marriott Orlando, Grande Lakes is the ideal resort for you. It offers a combination of timeless elegance and idyllic tropical landscapes that provide spectacular views from lavishly appointed rooms. This destination offers plenty of opportunities for fun, sport and pampering, without ever leaving the 500-acre resort. The Resort offers a wide selection of onsite activities with an 18-hole Championship golf course, 40,000 square foot Spa and adventure experiences including fly fishing, eco-tours and kayaking. There are 7 restaurants and bars offering guests a unique culinary experience. The guest rooms are furnished and fitted to the highest standards and accentuated by a Lazy River Pool. The resort is also located just minutes away from world-famous attractions.
atAGlance: Free Scheduled Transportation to Walt Disney World® Resort and Universal Orlando Resort® Just minutes from all major attractions

content.name: Rosen Inn Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: We think the Rosen Inn Lake Buena Vista offers excellent value as well as being so close to Disney. In the 23 acres of landscaped grounds is a lake which is home to a variety of Floridian bird life. You will find all the great family amenities in your room, just beware you may just get too comfortable! There are some great deals in the family restaurant here, and a free shuttle bus will take you to the four Walt Disney World Resort theme parks. Disney springs is very close too — with a fantastic array of restaurants, bars and shops there.
content.hotelDescription: We think the Rosen Inn Lake Buena Vista offers excellent value as well as being so close to Disney. In the 23 acres of landscaped grounds is a lake which is home to a variety of Floridian bird life. There are some great deals in the family restaurant here, and a free shuttle bus will take you to the four Walt Disney World Resort theme parks. Disney springs is very close too — with a fantastic array of restaurants, bars and shops there.
atAGlance: Free scheduled transportation to most theme parks

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld
content.virginView: This plush hotel has a wide variety of facilities and activities including the R Aqua Zone, an interactive waterpark with two waterslides as well as two splash and play areas. Golfers can enjoy a round or two on the 18-hole Championship golf course nearby, while those interested in relaxing can lounge by the huge outdoor pool or take a dip in the fizzing Jacuzzi to wind down. There is an incredible choice of restaurants on site — ranging from fresh seafood to great steaks. Kids will love the play area, while adults can have fun in the Boardwalk Sports Bar.
content.hotelDescription: The Renaissance Orlando is perfectly located on International Drive. This plush, spacious hotel has oodles of restaurants, facilities and activities, including a sparkling, resort style pool.
atAGlance: Large outdoor pool and kids' pool

content.name: Disney's Pop Century Resort
content.virginView: A sure family favourite, Disney's Pop Century celebrates fads of the 1950s through to the 90s. There's something for everyone here - you'll love the themed pools, complete with water jets, and you can dine in a relaxed fashion at the food court. When the night rolls around, enjoy movies under the stars, or head to the games arcade for an evening of laughs before heading to your room. And when you're ready to hit the parks, hop on the Skyliner, a new gondola that gives you amazing birds-eye views while taking you to Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios.
content.hotelDescription: A sure family favourite, Disney's Pop Century celebrates fads of the 1950s through to the 90s. There's something for everyone here - you'll love the themed pools, complete with water jets, and you can dine in a relaxed fashion at the food court. When the night rolls around, enjoy movies under the stars, or head to the games arcade for an evening of laughs before heading to your room. And when you're ready to hit the parks, hop on the Skyliner, a new gondola that gives you amazing birds-eye views while taking you to Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios.

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

content.name: Ritz Carlton Orlando Grande Lakes
content.virginView: At The Ritz-Carlton, Orlando, Grande Lakes you can take in the ambience while retaining a sense of sophistication. This resort offers plenty of opportunities for fun, sport and pampering, without ever having to leave this 500-acre resort. The Resort offers a wide selection of on-site activities with an 18-hole Championship golf course, 40,000 sq ft spa and adventure experiences including fly fishing, eco-tours and kayaking. There is a choice of 11 restaurants and bars offering guests a unique culinary experience. Guest rooms are furnished and fitted to the highest standards and each of the sumptuous bedrooms has a 5ft balcony with panoramic view over the lake, pool or gardens. The resort is located minutes away from world-famous attractions such as Walt Disney World® Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™.
content.hotelDescription: At The Ritz-Carlton, Orlando, Grande Lakes you can take in the ambience while retaining a sense of sophistication. This resort offers plenty of opportunities for fun, sport and pampering, without ever having to leave this 500-acre resort. The Resort offers a wide selection of on-site activities with an 18-hole Championship golf course, 40,000 sq ft spa and adventure experiences including fly fishing, eco-tours and kayaking. there is a choice of 11 restaurants and bars offering guests a unique culinary experience. Guest rooms are furnished and fitted to the highest standards and each of the sumptuous bedrooms has a 5ft balcony with panoramic view over the lake, pool or gardens. The resort is located minutes away from world-famous attractions such as Walt Disney World® Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™.
atAGlance: Complimentary shuttle bus to Walt Disney World® Resort and Universal Orlando ResortȒ
Just minutes from all major attractions

content.name: Orlando World Centre Marriott
content.virginView: An oasis right next to Walt Disney World, the Orlando World Center Marriott has fun-for-all down to a tee. Whizz down the waterslides, and take a dip in one of a choice of pools — kids will go crazy for the splash zone! Treat yourself to some R&R in the spa, or have a round of golf. You’re spoilt for choice with places to eat, you won’t need to head out to find some good food. And when you’re ready to hit the parks, you’re just a short drive from Orlando’s adrenaline-packed coasters.
content.hotelDescription: An oasis right next to Walt Disney World, the Orlando World Center Marriott has fun-for-all down to a tee.
atAGlance: 5-minute drive to Walt Disney World Resort, with transport included in the resort fee
2 swimming pools, Spa and fitness centre

content.name: Disney's All Star Resorts
content.virginView: What could be better than three resorts in one? Disney's All-Star Resorts has movies, music and sports, so there really is something for everyone! Each resort has its own pools and themed activities going on, so you'll always be spoilt for choice. And when you decide to head out to the parks, Disney Springs is just a short bus ride away. If you want a larger than life, fun-filled, unforgettable Disney holiday, this one's for you.
content.hotelDescription: What could be better than three resorts in one? Disney's All-Star Resorts has movies, music and sports, so there really is something for everyone! Each resort has its own pools and themed activities going on, so you'll always be spoilt for choice. And when you decide to head out to the parks, Disney Springs is just a short bus ride away. If you want a larger than life, fun-filled, unforgettable Disney holiday, this one's for you.

Complimentary use of the Walt Disney World Resort transportation system
Three resorts in one, each with pools and activities

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

hotel.name: Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek

content.name: Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek
content.virginView: The one that’s got everybody talking, the Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek is an extraordinary hotel with a cool, hip vibe and superb amenities. For a start, there’s a 3-acre lazy river pool with an exciting waterslide for all ages. There’s also a fantastic kids' club packed with activities including water sports, bike tours, golfing, treasure hunts and arts and crafts. Whilst younger members of the family are kept more than busy, head to the spa for an indulgent but well-deserved treatment. When it comes to dining, there are 12 bars and restaurants to choose from serving delicious dishes from around the world. At the Hilton there’s La Luce for Italian inspired cuisine and Harvest Bistro serving American classics. Pop over the road to the Waldorf Astoria® and you can dine on steaks at the Bull & Bear. Disney’s theme parks are all very close by with amazing views of the Magic Kingdom Park, Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios from the hotel rooms! What’s more, there’s complimentary transport to all of them, so leave the car behind and simply enjoy!
content.hotelDescription: The one that’s got everybody talking, the Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek is an extraordinary hotel with a cool, hip vibe and superb amenities. For a start, there’s a 3-acre lazy river pool with an exciting waterslide for all ages. There’s also a fantastic kids' club packed with activities. Whilst younger members of the family are kept more than busy, head to the spa for an indulgent but well-deserved treatment. Disney’s theme parks are all very close by with amazing views of the Magic Kingdom Park, Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios from the hotel rooms! What’s more, there’s complimentary transport to all of them, so leave the car behind and simply enjoy!
atAGlance: Located minutes from the Disney theme parks with a complimentary shuttle service

content.name: Universal's Cabana Bay Beach Resort
content.virginView: Enjoy vibrant, retro-style with rooms and suites brilliantly designed for family-sized fun and affordability. Relax and play, surrounded by amazing iconic architecture inspired by classic Florida beach resorts of the 1950s and 60s. Two towers offer the best views of Universal’s Volcano Bay water theme park. You’ll enjoy endless family fun with two massive pools including a water slide and a lazy river, 10-lane bowling alley*, and Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay one hour before the theme parks open (select attractions, valid theme park admission required). The whole family can stay comfortably in family suites that sleep up to six, complete with a kitchenette, or relax in one of the hotel’s standard rooms that sleep up to four. You're just a short walk to Universal's Volcano Bay and a quick, free shuttle ride to Universal Studios Florida and Universal's Islands of Adventure, as well as Universal CityWalk entertainment complex.
content.hotelDescription: Experience the excitement of Universal Orlando Resort in a whole new way at Universal’s Cabana Bay Beach Resort, with more rooms and more fun for less.
atAGlance: Two complimentary inflatable rubber rings per room
Complimentary welcome drink; Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry PotterȒ

hotel.name: Fairfield Inn - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista

content.name: Fairfield Inn - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value. And If somebody was to offer you a hotel that provides complimentary breakfast and is just 3 minutes drive from Walt Disney World, with a complimentary shuttle to drop you to the door, it would sound too good to be true. It’s not – it’s here! The bunk beds in the family suites will be a hit with the kids, as will the games room and outdoor pool for those moments when you’re not out exploring in the parks. The superb dining and entertainment choices of Downtown Disney are only minutes away,  and it’s not just great for Disney, you're close to all the attractions on International Drive and a short hop from the Orlando outlets.
content.hotelDescription: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value, the Courtyard by Marriott offering a higher standard of furnishings and comfort, while the SpringHill Suites have more of a studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area.
atAGlance: Close to the shops, bars, and restaurants at Disney Springs
Free shuttle to Walt Disney World

hotel.name: Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort

content.name: Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort Area is located within walking distance of Disney Springs®, an excellent choice to enjoy all 150 amenities on offer. You’ll also have complimentary transportation to the Disney Parks® and Universal Studios that’s just a short distance away. After an exciting day at the most magical place on Earth, you can rest up in the comfy of your room, with beautiful views of the lake or the courtyard and feel the warm Florida breeze.
content.hotelDescription: Located within walking distance of Disney Springs™, the Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista provides a great base in a great location with entertainment, dining and shopping right on your doorstep. As part of the Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Resort, it shares the wide range of facilities including an aquatic playground and swimming pool with a spacious sundeck area and sporting activities such as tennis and basketball.
atAGlance: Complimentary transportation to Disney Parks® and early access included

hotel.name: Springhill Suites - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista

content.name: Springhill Suites - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the SpringHill Suites offering studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area, great for families and the extra space means you won't feel like you're on top of each other. There is complimentary shuttle access to selected parks, and a free buffet breakfast to fuel the whole family before a day exploring. The superb dining and entertainment choices of Lake Buena Vista and Downtown Disney are only minutes away, while the resort has its own Village Marketplace Food Court should you not feel like venturing out. Whichever hotel you decide best suits you, you'll know that you're in a great location near to both Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando® Resort, with one of Florida's best premium outlet malls on your doorstep!
content.hotelDescription: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value, the Courtyard by Marriott offering a higher standard of furnishings and comfort, while the SpringHill Suites have more of a studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area.
atAGlance: Close to the shops, bars, and restaurants at Disney Springs
Free shuttle to Walt Disney World

content.name: Holiday Inn Orlando Airport
content.virginView: Just 1 mile from Orlando International Airport, this recently renovated hotel brings you luxurious guest rooms and a wide range of amenities in a great location. Hop straight off the plane into first class accommodation. Once you have got your bearings, head into town to sample the many attractions on offer. There are restaurants galore nearby or stay put and sample creative cuisine at the Bristol Café and Lounge which features a new internet café. The Bristol Bar and Grille is next door to the restaurant and a great place to relax, play a game of table shuffleboard perhaps and enjoy a hearty steak dinner American-sized of course! To work off your dinner, there is a state-of-the-art fitness centre, an outdoor heated swimming pool, whirlpool and various sports courts anyone for a game of tennis?
content.hotelDescription: Just 1 mile from Orlando International Airport, this recently renovated hotel brings you luxurious guest rooms and a wide range of amenities in a great location. Hop straight off the plane into first class accommodation. Once you have got your bearings, head into town to sample the many attractions on offer. There are restaurants galore nearby or stay put and sample creative cuisine at the Bristol Café and Lounge which features a new internet café. The Bristol Bar and Grille is next door to the restaurant and a great place to relax, play a game of table shuffleboard perhaps and enjoy a hearty steak dinner - American-sized of course! To work off your dinner, there is a state-of-the-art fitness centre, an outdoor heated swimming pool, whirlpool and various sports courts. Anyone for a game of tennis?
atAGlance: Complimentary transfers to major theme parks

hotel.name: Grand Hotel Orlando at Universal Blvd

content.name: Grand Hotel Orlando at Universal Blvd
content.virginView: The Grand Hotel Orlando serves as a great base for all your Florida adventures. You’ll have Universal Orlando Resort™ and Walt Disney World® Resort just a shuttle ride away, and all the attractions and Florida favourites within a short driving distance. Your room has all the essentials, and there's even a free buffet breakfast every morning for you to enjoy. After a day at the parks, take a dip in the pool.

Your room has all the essentials, and there's even a free buffet breakfast every morning for you to enjoy. After a day at the parks, take a dip in the pool.
